== AO: Annotation Ontology ==

==== Introduction ====
The _Annotation Ontology_ is a vocabulary for defining several kind of annotations - comment, entities annotation (or semantic tags), textual annotation (classic tags), notes, erratum... - on potentially any kind of document (text, images, audio...) and document part. <br/> See the complete list of [RequirementsUseCases requirements and use cases].

==== Related Ontologies ====

AO has been influenced by an analysis of strengths and weaknesses of the [http://www.w3.org/2001/Annotea/ Annotea Project]. AO has been also integrated with [http://sioc-project.org/ SIOC (Semantically-Interlinked Online Communities)].
